author: Crl
text: I was sold fake shoes. The Nike swoosh was partially attached to one of the shoes. The stitching on the toe is two different sizes. I will never buy another pair of shoes from Stock X.
title: I was sold fake shoes

author: Robert Harrell
text: Takes to long for shipping and too much
title: Takes to long for shipping and too much

author: danny
text: quality isn’t that good
title: quality isn’t that good

author: Monisha Carter
text: I ordered shoes, the delivery company DHL never delivered my shoes and they told me they were looking for my package, once they couldn’t find it they told me reach out to Stockx for refund, Stockx would not open investigation, claiming it was to late, but I was just following delivery instructions.
title: I ordered shoes

author: Tristan
text: I placed an order for $309.86 on 3/11/22 for my son’s birthday. I was asked by StockX to wait while my order was being processed and authenticated and to expect delivery on or about 3/21/22. Much to our surprise the tracking showed delivered on 3/19/22 however we did not receive the shipment as indicated. When trying to get in contact with StockX has been impossible. There is not a chat box to speak with anyone nor a working 800#. I feel like I just gave $309.86 to a fake internet company and also have a very disappointed teenager. So far I wouldn’t recommend StockX.com to anyone. I want a refund. 3/28/22 still no one reached out nor have I been refunded.
title: No customer support/ Buyer beware
